Name: Average time from 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' to 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Total time from 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week' to 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Minimum time from 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days' to 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Average time between 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total resolution time of 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity SW-Reviewer Declined and the end of the case

Name: Average waiting time to the 'SW-Reviewer Declined' after 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Minimum time it takes 'SW-Reviewer Declined' after 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Average time for 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to lead to 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total time for all instances of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' in the event log
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity SW-Reviewer Declined and the end of the case

Name: Average time between 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and the subsequent 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' before 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time it takes from 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Average time from 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' for cases where reviewers eventually agree after initially declining
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time from 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to 'SW-EIC Major Revision' in cases leading to major revisions
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Minimum time from 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' in the review process
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'
